lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sunday, Nov. 23 (U.P.) -- New German gains on the Moscow front, where what is termed "probably the greatest battle ever fought" left blood-soaked fields strewn with thousands of German bodies and the wreckage of hundreds of tanks, were acknowledged today in reports from the Soviet capital.
abstract: USSR admits withdrawals, Moscow area; battle called heaviest of war; USSR silent on Rostov; heavy German losses claimed
